text: Rinus Michels (9 February 1928 – 3 March 2005) was a Dutch football player and football manager. He played for Ajax and Netherlands national team. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Division Apps Goals Ajax 1945–46 Football League Championship 12 13 1946–47 28 14 1947–48 5 3 1948–49 20 7 1949–50 26 16 1950–51 14 5 1951–52 19 15 1952–53 20 8 1953–54 26 12 1954–55 33 14 1955–56 30 8 1956–57 Eredivisie 29 7 1957–58 2 0 Career total Career total Career total 264 122 ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Team From To Ajax 22 January 1965 30 June 1971 Barcelona 1 July 1971 30 June 1975 Netherlands 27 March 1974 7 July 1974 Ajax 1 July 1975 30 June 1976 Barcelona 1 July 1976 30 June 1978 Los Angeles Aztecs 1 July 1978 13 October 1980 ? ? ? ? ? 1\.
